page.title: 11Toshiba Factory - Ernesettle
page.content:
Toshiba is a Japanese firm that has spread all over the world. The Toshiba factory makes T.V. and video recording sets. In one day, 1200 television sets are produced. These sets are sold all over the world, and cost from Â£150 - Â£500. The factory is very modern and has a lot of new and expensive machinery. Besides machines, there is a restaurant which is used by all levels of workers. There is also a reception area, bank, shop and administration office. The average worker on the production line earns about Â£320 each month.
Mary Garthwaite
